_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Keys with _else are produced with non-trained Stanford NLP and as such only includes capitalized words. The + designates a segment range. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc69:1.6^speaker: monks from the group of six
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc69:2.1.8^speaker: one who says this (referring to the monk Ariṭṭha)
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc69:2.1.8^where_before_or_: Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika's Monastery
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc69:2.1.8^who_mentioned_be: the monk who has been given the full ordination
the one who has been ejected
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc69^where: Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika's Monastery
